idea-plugin.name: XHttp
idea-plugin.description: Run the interface developed based on SpringBoot and SpringMvc, and support PostMapping, GetMapping, DeleteMapping, PutMapping and PatchMapping.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Based on the interface of SpringBoot and SpringMvc, it supports one-key generation of corresponding interface testing tools.
Modify the window adaptation problem, improve the interface parameter cache.

Plugin.xml adds JAVA dependencies.
Add support for RequestMapping.
Add automatic exclusion parameter,HttpSession,HttpServletResponse,HttpServletRequest.

• The return information is automatically JSON formatted
  • Supports file upload requests
  • RequestBody requests are supported
  • Request headers are dynamically added and removed
  • When you click Clear, clear the single request cache
  • Sets the add exclude parameter configuration
  • The request parameters box can be dragged
